1.Policy is valid for 12 or 24 months from the commencement date as selected at purchase. Renewal may be available subject to company guidelines.
2.The full premium must be paid upfront before the policy becomes active. Coverage starts only after payment confirmation.
3.All applications are subject to standard underwriting procedures, including document verification and risk assessment. The insurer may accept, modify, or decline coverage.
4.Claims must be reported and filed within 30 days from the date of the incident. Late submissions may be rejected unless approved by the insurer.
5.Coverage is subject to policy exclusions, limitations, and compliance with all terms and conditions. Non-compliance may result in claim denial or policy termination.
